instruction: Construct an analogy that compares a smartphone to an appliance.
output: A smartphone is like a kitchen appliance; it is a modern, multifunctional device that provides a plethora of tools that can be used to make life more convenient. It can be used to search for information, play music, watch videos, contact family and friends, and more, just like a kitchen appliance can be used to cook, blend, and even clean.
